dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2576 : To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify requirements relating to the availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to modify requirements relating to the availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents, and for other purposes.

section.header: Availability of pipeline safety regulatory documents
section.text: Section 60102(p) of title 49, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking 1 year and inserting 3 years;
by striking , on an Internet Web site.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 16, 2013.
